name: Telegraph
description:
Telegraph

Telegraph explores the ideas of visual convention, just by looking at the screen can you determine what you are suppose to do. 

Do the game conventions that I as a designer consider to be true, match those of the player (you)?

With the exception of changing scenarios the game provides no feedback until the very end of the game.

---

This is part of a series of games exploring communication between the game and the player. The first game in the series is:

https://dr-d-king.itch.io/sequence which looks at feedback without guidance.
